root: ^After walking for about twenty minutes, they come across a stretch of road that's completely waterlogged, thick mud stretching across their path for about fifty meters.
^Well, would you look at that... (grins at Aldrin)
^You know what? I take it back. Even if your ancient chariot hadn't given up on life, it would've been stuck here for sure.
^(studying the mud) Nah, it can take it. Four-wheel drive, decent clearance. Would've been fine.
^(laughing) Aldrin, this isn't mud, this is practically quicksand. Your car would've sunk faster than the Titanic.
^Maybe there is something in the back that we can use to cross this mud. Let’s check it out.
^They go back to the car and finding a ladder
